English.about: From an early age I’ve always been deeply interested in computers. As a child, I was attracted by computers games, but was later attracted in the inner workings of the machines, why they worked and what else they were capable of. After getting into college, I was fascinated with programming. I love the feeling of solving problems in the real world through coding, as well as the sense of achievement from others’ acknowledgments under my technical blogs. The coding, eventually, became a part of my life. Therefore, in the future, I wish to pursue a deeper understanding of programming and the broader knowledge of computer science.
honours: The First Prize, The Tenth Programming Design Contest, by HZNU 12.2016
The First Prize, 2017 Group Programming Ladder Tournament (GPLT), by AFCEC 04.2017
The Second Prize (National Level), The Ninth China Students Service Outsourcing Innovation & Entrepreneurship Competition, by Ministry of Education, 06.2018

projects.name: SimpleNote
projects.des: My startup react web application, an online note editor

projects.name: Reversi
projects.des: Based on NodeJS and SocketIO, an real time Reversi game

projects.name: Lv Dou mobile application
projects.des: It is a mobile demo application for the presentation of Service Outsourcing Innovation & Entrepreneurship Competition

projects.name: Association
projects.des: Course Project of Web programming, an online association management system

imgList.name: Red braised pork
imgList.description: I love cooking, cooking let me feel relax and eating delicious food is an indispensable apart of my life

imgList.name: HZNU
imgList.description: Actually I am not quite like my undergraduate university, for its location and some boring or even malicious professors, but still there are many nice guys, and we spent a great period of time together

imgList.name: Metro
imgList.description: I always go to different places to travel or attend competitions, I guess it is the most interesting part of the 4 year in HZNU
